deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@dev RariMine, a contract that allows to increase (function plus())
      or decrease (function minus()) the balance of ERC20 users tokens.
      Also user can initiate stake or withdraw his own amount of ERC20 tokens.
      In function claim() Withdraw case works only for slopePeriod == cliffPeriod == 0,
      else stake`ll be initiate with amount equal ERC20 tokens user balance.

@dev function, allow stake amount ERC20 tokens or
      withdraw ERC20 tokens to user if slopePeriod == cliffPeriod == 0

@dev function, add users balances in cycle by contract owner
 @param _balances, array balances

@dev function, sub users balances in cycle by contract owner
 @param _balances, array balances

@dev function, set new slopePeriod by contract owner
 @param _slopePeriod, new value (number of weeks) for slopePeriod

@dev function, set new cliffPeriod by contract owner
 @param _cliffPeriod, new value (number of weeks) for cliffPeriod

attributes.text:
@dev RariMine, a contract that allows to increase (function plus())
      or decrease (function minus()) the balance of ERC20 users tokens.
      Also user can initiate stake or withdraw his own amount of ERC20 tokens.
      In function claim() Withdraw case works only for slopePeriod == cliffPeriod == 0,
      else stake`ll be initiate with amount equal ERC20 tokens user balance.

@dev function, allow stake amount ERC20 tokens or
      withdraw ERC20 tokens to user if slopePeriod == cliffPeriod == 0

@dev function, add users balances in cycle by contract owner
 @param _balances, array balances

@dev function, sub users balances in cycle by contract owner
 @param _balances, array balances

@dev function, set new slopePeriod by contract owner
 @param _slopePeriod, new value (number of weeks) for slopePeriod

@dev function, set new cliffPeriod by contract owner
 @param _cliffPeriod, new value (number of weeks) for cliffPeriod

devdoc.details: RariMine, a contract that allows to increase (function plus())      or decrease (function minus()) the balance of ERC20 users tokens.      Also user can initiate stake or withdraw his own amount of ERC20 tokens.      In function claim() Withdraw case works only for slopePeriod == cliffPeriod == 0,      else stake`ll be initiate with amount equal ERC20 tokens user balance.

__RariMine_init(address,address,address).details: __RariMine_init, initialise necessary contracts needed for work

claim().details: function, allow stake amount ERC20 tokens or      withdraw ERC20 tokens to user if slopePeriod == cliffPeriod == 0

minus((address,uint256)[]).details: function, sub users balances in cycle by contract owner

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

plus((address,uint256)[]).details: function, add users balances in cycle by contract owner

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setCliffPeriod(uint256).details: function, set new cliffPeriod by contract owner

params._cliffPeriod: , new value (number of weeks) for cliffPeriod

setSlopePeriod(uint256).details: function, set new slopePeriod by contract owner

params._slopePeriod: , new value (number of weeks) for slopePeriod

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
